arguments.description: - (Required, string) Name of the server to create (must be unique per project and a valid hostname as per RFC 1123).
- (Required, string) Name of the server type this server should be created with.
- (Required, string) Name or ID of the image the server is created from.
- (Optional, string) The location name to create the server in. , or
- (Optional, string) The datacenter name to create the server in.
- (Optional, string) Cloud-Init user data to use during server creation
- (Optional, list) SSH key IDs or names which should be injected into the server at creation time
- (Optional, bool) If true, do not upgrade the disk. This allows downgrading the server type later.
- (Optional, string) Name of an ISO image to mount.
- (Optional, string) Enable and boot in to the specified rescue system. This enables simple installation of custom operating systems. or
- (Optional, map) User-defined labels (key-value pairs) should be created with.
- (Optional, boolean) Enable or disable backups.
- (Required, string) Name of the volume to create (must be unique per project).
- (Required, int) Size of the volume (in GB).
- (Optional, int) Server to attach the Volume to, optional if location argument is passed.
- (Optional, string) Location of the volume to create, optional if server_id argument is passed.
- (Required, int) ID of the Volume.
- (Required, int) Server to attach the Volume to.
- (Required, string) Name of the SSH key.
- (Required, string) The public key. If this is a file, it can be read using the file interpolation function
- (Required, string) Type of the Floating IP.
- (Optional, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.
- (Optional, string) Home location (routing is optimized for that location). Optional if server_id argument is passed.
- (Optional, string) Description of the Floating IP.
- (Required, int) ID of the Floating IP.
- (Required, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.
- (Required, string) The DNS address the should resolve to.
- (Required, string) The IP address that should point to .
- (Required, int) The server the belongs to.
- (Required, int) The Floating IP the belongs to.
- (Optional, string) IP address of the Floating IP.
- (Optional, string)
- (Optional, string) ID of the Image.
- (Optional, string) Name of the Image.
- (Optional, string)
- (Optional, bool) If more than one result is returned, use the most recent Image.
- (Optional, string) ID of the SSH Key.
- (Optional, string) Name of the SSH Key.
- (Optional, string) Fingerprint of the SSH Key.
- (Optional, string)
- ID of the volume.
- Name of the volume.
- Label Selector. For more information about possible values, visit the .
